events.message: I just received the laptop I ordered last week and noticed multiple scratches on the screen and casing. It looks like a defective product.
The customer reported a product defect involving scratches on the laptop screen and casing.
Customer case assigned to support agent to handle product defect issue.
Hello, thank you for contacting us about the scratched laptop. Iâ€™m here to help resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a few photos of the scratches on your laptop so we can assess the damage and determine the next steps?
I have attached multiple pictures clearly showing the scratches concentrated on the screen and around the edges of the laptop.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement unit or a full refund due to the defective condition you received. Please let us know your preferred option.
I would prefer a replacement unit since I still want to use this model, but I appreciate the refund option as well.
We have processed your replacement request and you should receive the new laptop within 5 business days. Please return the defective unit with the prepaid shipping label.
Just following up to ensure your replacement laptop arrived in good condition. Please reach out if you have any further issues or questions.
Since the replacement was received and no further problems were reported, we are closing this support case now. Thank you for your patience.
